Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Physicist \Phys"i*cist\, n. One versed in physics. [1913 Webster]
2. (Biol.) A believer in the theory that the fundamental phenomena of life are to be explained upon purely chemical and physical principles; -- opposed to vitalist. [1913 Webster]
physicist n : a scientist trained in physics
